trans-unit.source: Abstract class that describes a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] drawing.
trans-unit.target: 抽象类，用于描述[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)]绘制。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by your code.
trans-unit.target: 你的代码，此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Drawing objects are light-weight objects that enable you to add geometric shapes, images, text, and media to an application.
trans-unit.target: 图形对象是使您能够将几何形状、 图像、 文本和媒体添加到应用程序的轻型对象。

trans-unit.source: Drawing objects are considered light-weight because they do not provide support for [Layout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and focus.
trans-unit.target: 绘制对象被视为轻量，因为它们不提供支持[布局](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，[输入概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和焦点。

trans-unit.source: Because of their performance benefits, drawings are ideal for backgrounds and clip art.
trans-unit.target: 因为其性能优势，绘图非常适合背景和剪贴画。

trans-unit.source: You also use drawings when programming at the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> level.
trans-unit.target: 在进行编程时还使用绘图<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>级别。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: Because they inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, Drawing objects provide additional features that make them useful for describing clip art and backgrounds: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 因为它们从其继承<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>类，图形对象提供其他功能，使它们可用于描述剪贴画和背景︰ 可以声明为在多个对象，进行只读的之间共享以及进行线程安全。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关提供的不同功能的详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: There are different types of Drawing objects for different types of content: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>.
trans-unit.target: 有不同类型的不同类型的内容的图形对象︰ <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A Drawing is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: 可冻结功能绘制是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](../Topic/Freezable%20Objects%20Overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](../Topic/Freezable%20Objects%20Overview.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the axis-aligned bounds of the drawing's contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取与轴对齐绘制的内容的边界。

trans-unit.source: The axis-aligned bounds of the drawing's contents.
trans-unit.target: 与轴对齐绘制的内容的边界。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。
